items.storedetaileddescription:
What is Bond Breaker Shampoo?

 

 

Walker Tape®’s Bond Breaker Shampoo is the most important part of preparing for an install. It breaks down adhesive residue, exfoliates the scalp, and helps improve hold times. Use Bond Breaker Shampoo after hair system removal and before the next install. This product is not for daily use. Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly. With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.

 

   

Why use Bond Breaker Shampoo?

 

Bond Breaker Shampoo is the most important step when it comes to preparing for installation. 


Using a gentle formula made with specialized wax beads that protect the hair, Bond Breaker Shampoo washes out residual stickiness (whether it be adhesive, remover, dirt, sweat, etc.) from both the system and the scalp, scrubbing and bathing it all squeaky clean.

 

If you want to achieve the best bond, adhesion, or application for your clients; Bond Breaker Shampoo is the all-in-one cleaning tool that will help you.

items.storedescription:
How to Use Bond Breaker Shampoo

 

 

We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

   

Directions

  1. Apply a small amount to the hair and scalp. 
  2. Rub in as normal shampoo but focus on the adhesive areas. This product will break down adhesive bonds and clean up residue on the hair and scalp. 
  3. Rinse like a normal shampoo and repeat if necessary.
